thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 4 of 625
thread.title: FluffyPuff138

author: FluffyPuff138
title: FluffyPuff138
text: I've never had a problem with any order, they take awhile sometimes, but it only happens when I order many things and that is because stuff is coming in from different countries so it is understandable. The quality of the items I get is actually very good for the price I pay most of the time. I can shop a little more cautiously now and see what may be of better quality, but even then it is usually at a very fair, or even cheap price.
